options.code:
return parameters.string
        .normalize('NFD')                // Normalize Unicode to NFD form (separates accents)
        .replace(/[\u0300-\u036f]/g, '') // Remove accents
        .replace(/[^\w\s-]/g, '')        // Remove special characters but keep underscores and hyphens
        .toLowerCase()                   // Convert to lowercase
        .trim()                          // Trim leading/trailing spaces
        .replace(/[–—]/g, '-')           // Convert em-dashes to hyphens
        .replace(/[_\s]+/g, '-')         // Replace spaces and underscores with hyphens
        .replace(/-+/g, '-')             // Collapse multiple hyphens
        .replace(/^-|-$/g, '');
